headline: Saudi Arabia Buy Now Pay Later Business and Investment Report 2025: A $2.36 Billion Market by 2030 Featuring Tamara, Tabby, Spotti, Postpay, Telr, Cashew Payments, Mastercard, Visa, Affirm, Zippay
summary: Saudi Arabia's BNPL market is thriving, driven by digitalization, younger consumer preferences, and competition among providers like Tamara and Tabby. headline: Beyond by RS2 and Mediengruppe Deutschland Launch Digital Fan Ecosystem with Nürnberg Ice Tigers
summary: FRANKFURT, Germany & BERLIN & NUREMBERG, Germany, November 27, 2025--Beyond by RS2 and Mediengruppe Deutschland launch Ice Tigers digital fan ecosystem with payments, loyalty, content and engagement.

headline: Thredd signs agreement for Visa Cloud Connect global rollout
summary: Thredd said that this development builds on its relationship with Visa and highlights a shared interest in progressing cloud-based infrastructure in payment.
